cleaned_text: Description Detox Ultimate is a comprehensive, fructose-free, low-allergy-potential functional food designed to provide optimal cleansing. This second generation formula provides high quality and easy digestibility. It features a proprietary pea/rice protein blend to facilitate protein absorption. In conjunction with a modified elimination diet, Detox Ultimate targets patients in need of gastrointestinal, hepatic, and anti-inflammatory support. This formula is suitable for vegans.
